name: Mixed tax rate
description: Code specifying that the rate is based on mixed tax.

name: Lower rate
description: Tax rate is lower than standard rate.

name: Exempt for resale
description: A tax category code indicating the item is tax exempt when the item is bought for future resale.

name: Value Added Tax (VAT) not now due for payment
description: A code to indicate that the Value Added Tax (VAT) amount which is due on the current invoice is to be paid on receipt of a separate VAT payment request.

name: Value Added Tax (VAT) due from a previous invoice
description: A code to indicate that the Value Added Tax (VAT) amount of a previous invoice is to be paid.

name: VAT Reverse Charge
description: Code specifying that the standard VAT rate is levied from the invoicee.

name: Transferred (VAT)
description: VAT not to be paid to the issuer of the invoice but directly to relevant tax authority.

name: Duty paid by supplier
description: Duty associated with shipment of goods is paid by the supplier; customer receives goods with duty paid.

name: Value Added Tax (VAT) margin scheme - travel agents
description: Indication that the VAT margin scheme for travel agents is applied.

name: Exempt from tax
description: Code specifying that taxes are not applicable.

name: Value Added Tax (VAT) margin scheme - second-hand goods
description: Indication that the VAT margin scheme for second-hand goods is applied.

name: Free export item, tax not charged
description: Code specifying that the item is free export and taxes are not charged.

name: Higher rate
description: Code specifying a higher rate of duty or tax or fee.

name: Value Added Tax (VAT) margin scheme - works of art
description: Margin scheme  Works of art Indication that the VAT margin scheme for works of art is applied.

name: Value Added Tax (VAT) margin scheme - collectors items and
description: antiques Indication that the VAT margin scheme for collectors items and antiques is applied.

name: VAT exempt for EEA intra-community supply of goods and
description: services A tax category code indicating the item is VAT exempt due to an intra-community supply in the European Economic Area.

name: Canary Islands general indirect tax
description: Impuesto General Indirecto Canario (IGIC) is an indirect tax levied on goods and services supplied in the Canary Islands (Spain) by traders and professionals, as well as on import of goods.

name: Tax for production, services and importation in Ceuta and
description: Melilla Impuesto sobre la Producción, los Servicios y la Importación (IPSI) is an indirect municipal tax, levied on the production, processing and import of all kinds of movable tangible property, the supply of services and the transfer of immovable property located in the cities of Ceuta and Melilla.

name: standard rate additional VAT
description: standard VAT calculated for an additional taxable base when the additional taxable base is not included in the document totals

name: Services outside scope of tax
description: Code specifying that taxes are not applicable to the services.

name: Standard rate
description: Code specifying the standard rate.

name: Zero rated goods
description: Code specifying that the goods are at a zero rate.
